response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best value while also maximizing my earnings. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and provides a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
